pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## system-slash[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/sujitmandal/system-slash.svg?branch=main)](https://travis-ci.org/sujitmandal/system-slash) [![GitHub license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/sujitmandal/system-slash)](https://github.com/sujitmandal/system-slash/blob/main/LICENSE) ![PyPI - Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/system-slash) ![PyPI - Wheel](https://img.shields.io/pypi/wheel/system-slash) ![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/system-slash)[![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/system-slash)](https://pepy.tech/project/system-slash)It will find operating system and then generate slash as per system required.## Package Installation :```pip install system-slash```[Package Link](https://pypi.org/project/system-slash/)## How to import the module:```pythonfrom SystemSlash.SystemSlash import slashsystem = slash()print(system)```## License:```MIT Licensed```## Author:```Sujit Mandal```[GitHub](https://github.com/sujitmandal)[PyPi](https://pypi.org/user/sujitmandal/)[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sujit-mandal-91215013a/)
